reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater beautiful with details that elevate its style, and appreciate its super soft texture and high-end quality. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer noting its bold black shade. While some customers report a perfect fit, others mention it runs too long, and the fabric quality receives mixed reviews with some praising it while others find it awful. Additionally, customers repor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater
items.body: Loved the comfort and fit of this sweater. Great value for material. I found it to be warm and soft. Style & cut is flattering. Would buy again. Read more
items.author: Chris5390

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Attractive and true to size, but snags easily
items.body: This is a nice sweater, the color is nice and the stitch is attractive. It's got a smooth feel, almost silky. The only downside--it snags super easily. I didn't have it on for more than 15 minutes before it snagged on something. Not sure why that is, but it's a bummer. Read more
items.author: Kit B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Warm, soft, stretchy, and I LOVE the color of the sweater. Looks more expensive than it is. I love the detail. Just be careful not to snag it. If you do, pull the fabric in different directions all around the snag to try to get the fibers and stitches back in the right place. I havenâ€™t washed it yet, havenâ€™t yet worn it with a coat over it or a purse (something that might make it pill). Will update if either of those become an issue. I plan on washing this in a delicates bag to protect it. Read more
items.author: love the funnies

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater but fragile
items.body: The sweater is very nice, soft and material feels nice however on my first fay of wearing it easily pulled. My mom cut off a big pull on my back and i have no idea how that happened. So you have to be careful wearing any jewelry that can easily het stuck and pull on the sweater. Read more
items.author: Robert

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Low quality
items.body: It looked cute at first try on but I brought it on a trip and on the first day of wear it got so much snags and pills. I wasnâ€™t even doing anything out of the order, just out and about in a city, and it looked so bad/messy at the end of the day. Read more
items.author: Desiree S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High end quality sweater!!!
items.body: I was amazed at the quality of this sweater. It's like it came from a high end store. Beautiful fit, so soft, cozy and warm. It'll be a one of my favorites for fall and winter as the weight of it suits both. The color is a bold black and the detail, is gorgeous. For reference, I'm 5'7", 36B, 28 waist and I like my sweaters a little loose and ordered the medium. I could have ordered the small but decided to stay with the medium with the way it looks. Read more
items.author: pink3237

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fabric quality is poor
items.body: The sweater looks nice, but the fabric quality is awful. It snags easily on everything like, necklaces, wristwatch, bracelets, belts, handbags, etc. I could only wear it once and then had to throw it away because it got caught so many times that it ended up covered in loose threads. ðŸ˜© Read more
items.author: Ynharu Ramirez-Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top Sweater Pick for Fall!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I had some bad luck this week with a couple of online orders so I cautiously opened the package with this Grace Karen sweater. I was delightfully happy to find that it was a gorgeous and vibrant color with a lovely and unique weave. The feel is very soft and construction is excellent. I am a true small and this size small was a perfect fit. The details bring an elevation to the overall style: cuffed sleevesâ€¦. Cuffed bottomâ€¦. Excellent drapeâ€¦. Interesting shoulder seam. The value for price point is GREAT. One caution: if you have a pet who likes to jump on you, beware the high snag risk due to the intricate weave. Recommend! Read more
items.author: Kimberly Kelly

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, White, Deep Brown, Apricot, Black, Camel, Coffee, Navy Blue, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
